trans-unit.source: Angelic Favor
trans-unit.target: 天恩眷顾

trans-unit.resname: NEM·1 | Angelic Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying Angelic Favor's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控平原，你可改为横置一个你操控的未横置生物，以代替支付天恩眷顾的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·1 | Angelic Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Play Angelic Favor only during combat.
trans-unit.target: 你只能在战斗中使用天恩眷顾。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·1 | Angelic Favor | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying into play. Remove it from the game at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 放置一个4/4，白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生物进场。在回合结束时，将它移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: Avenger en-Dal
trans-unit.target: 达奥族复仇者

trans-unit.source: o2o W, oc T, Discard a card from your hand: Remove target attacking creature from the game. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 2W，T，从你手上弃掉一张牌：将目标进行攻击的生物移出游戏。该生物的操控者获得等同于其防御力的生命。

trans-unit.source: Blinding Angel
trans-unit.target: 眩目天使

trans-unit.resname: NEM·3 | Blinding Angel | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: NEM·3 | Blinding Angel | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当眩目天使对玩家造成战斗伤害，该玩家略过他的下一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.source: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."
trans-unit.target: 「他们的眼必将瞽盲于真理之明光。」

trans-unit.source: Chieftain en-Dal
trans-unit.target: 达奥族骑士长

trans-unit.source: Whenever Chieftain en-Dal attacks, attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当达奥族骑士长攻击时，攻击生物获得先攻异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The clearest commands are practical examples.
trans-unit.target: 最清楚的指令就是以身作则。

trans-unit.source: Defender en-Vec
trans-unit.target: 维克族捍卫者

trans-unit.resname: NEM·5 | Defender en-Vec | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退4（此生物进场时，上面有四个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.resname: NEM·5 | Defender en-Vec | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove a fade counter from Defender en-Vec: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: 从维克族捍卫者上移去一个消退指示物：在本回合中对目标生物或玩家防止接下来的2点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Defiant Falcon
trans-unit.target: 无畏猎鹰

trans-unit.source: Flying o4, oc T: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 4，T：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于3的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Defiant Vanguard
trans-unit.target: 无畏前锋

trans-unit.source: When Defiant Vanguard blocks, at end of combat, destroy it and all creatures it blocked this turn. o5, oc T: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当无畏前锋进行阻挡，在战斗结束时，消灭无畏前锋及所有在本回合中被其阻挡的生物。 5，T：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于4的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Fanatical Devotion
trans-unit.target: 狂热舍身

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：重生目标生物。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle told Eladamri he would save his people by abandoning them. His followers adopted that ideal.
trans-unit.target: 神谕使告诉艾拉达力，他必须抛下自己的族人以拯救他们。而他的跟随者们也确实奉行了这个信条。

trans-unit.source: Lashknife
trans-unit.target: 锁链刀

trans-unit.source: If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying Lashknife's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控平原，你可改为横置一个你操控的未横置生物，以代替支付锁链刀之魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: Those it won't scare, it scars.
trans-unit.target: 不怕这长鞭的人，就等著挨鞭吧。

trans-unit.source: Lawbringer
trans-unit.target: 律法使徒

trans-unit.source: oc T, Sacrifice Lawbringer: Remove target red creature from the game.
trans-unit.target: T，牺牲律法使徒：将目标红色生物移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: One injustice starts a thousand riots. One law stops a thousand crimes.\n—Lawbringer creed
trans-unit.target: 一件不公，能引起上千场暴乱。一条律法，能平息上千个罪愆。～律法使徒信条

trans-unit.source: Lightbringer
trans-unit.target: 明光使徒

trans-unit.source: oc T, Sacrifice Lightbringer: Remove target black creature from the game.
trans-unit.target: T，牺牲明光使徒：将目标黑色生物移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: One thought opens a thousand eyes. One sun brings a thousand dawns.\n—Lightbringer creed
trans-unit.target: 一股思想，能点醒上千个灵魂。一个太阳，能带来上千个黎明。～明光使徒信条

trans-unit.resname: NEM·12 | Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero
trans-unit.target: 无畏勇士琳‧西薇

trans-unit.resname: NEM·12 | Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o X, oc T: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library. o3: Put target Rebel card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: X，T：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于X的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。 3：将目标反抗军牌从你的坟墓场中置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Netter en-Dal
trans-unit.target: 达奥布网师

trans-unit.source: o W, oc T, Discard a card from your hand: Target creature can't attack this turn.
trans-unit.target: W，T，从你手上弃掉一张牌：目标生物在本回合中不可进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: The wizard's vocabulary of mogg profanities increased with every net she cast.
trans-unit.target: 每撒出一面网，魔法师便多学会了几句莫葛们的粗话。

trans-unit.source: Noble Stand
trans-unit.target: 英勇固守

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control blocks, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你操控的一个生物进行阻挡时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Soldiers will always endanger their lives to defend many other lives.
trans-unit.target: 为了更多其他人的性命，士兵总是让自己陷入危难之中。

trans-unit.source: Off Balance
trans-unit.target: 踉跄

trans-unit.source: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物在本回合中不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.source: A heavy weapon deals plenty of damage—but it does have to hit.
trans-unit.target: 重型武器有著惊人的破坏力～但是得要打中才行。

trans-unit.source: Oracle's Attendants
trans-unit.target: 神谕使随员

trans-unit.source: oc T: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
trans-unit.target: T：选择一个来源，把此来源在本回合中将对目标生物造成的所有伤害，改为对神谕使随员造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.
trans-unit.target: 虽然未来并非神圣不可侵扰，但其阐述者确实是如此。

trans-unit.source: Parallax Wave
trans-unit.target: 时空震脉波

trans-unit.resname: NEM·17 | Parallax Wave | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 5
trans-unit.target: 消退5

trans-unit.resname: NEM·17 | Parallax Wave | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove a fade counter from Parallax Wave: Remove target creature from the game.
trans-unit.target: 从时空震脉波上移去一个消退指示物：将目标生物移出游戏。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·17 | Parallax Wave | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Parallax Wave leaves play, each player returns to play all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Wave.
trans-unit.target: 当时空震脉波离场时，每位玩家将所有他所拥有，且被时空震脉波移出游戏的生物返回场上。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·18 | Seal of Cleansing | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seal of Cleansing
trans-unit.target: 净化之缄印

trans-unit.resname: NEM·18 | Seal of Cleansing | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲净化之缄印：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·18 | Seal of Cleansing | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."\n—Seal inscription
trans-unit.target: 「吾乃净化之源，是为驱离所有暗影之明光。」 ～缄印铭文

trans-unit.source: Silkenfist Fighter
trans-unit.target: 丝拳战士

trans-unit.source: Whenever Silkenfist Fighter becomes blocked, untap it.
trans-unit.target: 每当丝拳战士被阻挡时，将其重置。

trans-unit.source: Simple wooden staff\nMade from life, protecting life,\nStronger than cold steel.
trans-unit.target: 简简单单一根木杖，自活物制成，亦保护活物，比冰冷的钢铁更加强韧。

trans-unit.source: Silkenfist Order
trans-unit.target: 丝拳教士团

trans-unit.source: Whenever Silkenfist Order becomes blocked, untap it.
trans-unit.target: 每当丝拳教士团被阻挡时，将其重置。

trans-unit.source: Hands weave life and death;\nIntertwining spirits knit\nTapestries and shrouds.
trans-unit.target: 双手编造生命与死亡，以心灵接合织物，不论是织锦或是寿衣。

trans-unit.source: Sivvi's Ruse
trans-unit.target: 西薇的妙计

trans-unit.resname: NEM·21 | Sivvi's Ruse | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an opponent controls a mountain and you control a plains, you may play Sivvi's Ruse without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若任一对手操控山脉，并且你操控平原，则你不需支付其魔法力费用，便可以使用西薇的妙计。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·21 | Sivvi's Ruse | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 在本回合中防止你所操控的生物将受到的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: Sivvi's Valor
trans-unit.target: 西薇的勇气

trans-unit.resname: NEM·22 | Sivvi's Valor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying the mana cost of Sivvi's Valor.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控平原，你可改为横置一个你操控的未横置生物，以代替支付西薇的勇气之魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·22 | Sivvi's Valor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn is dealt to you instead.
trans-unit.target: 把在本回合中将要对目标生物造成之所有伤害，改为对你造成伤害。

trans-unit.source: Spiritual Asylum
trans-unit.target: 心灵庇护所

trans-unit.resname: NEM·23 | Spiritual Asylum | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures and lands you control can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 你所操控的生物和地皆不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·23 | Spiritual Asylum | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When a creature you control attacks, sacrifice Spiritual Asylum.
trans-unit.target: 当你操控的生物攻击时，牺牲心灵庇护所。

trans-unit.source: Trapped in safety is still trapped.
trans-unit.target: 受困于安全之中，依然是被困住了。

trans-unit.source: Topple
trans-unit.target: 推翻

trans-unit.source: Remove target creature with the greatest power from the game. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target only one of them.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标力量最大的生物移出游戏。（若两个或更多生物符合此条件，你只能以其中一个为目标。）

trans-unit.source: "Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."\n—Crovax
trans-unit.target: 「让大家知道违抗我的下场。」 ～寇维克斯

trans-unit.resname: NEM·25 | Voice of Truth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Voice of Truth
trans-unit.target: 真理使者

trans-unit.resname: NEM·25 | Voice of Truth | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from white
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反白保护

trans-unit.resname: NEM·25 | Voice of Truth | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent."\n—*Song of All*, canto 167
trans-unit.target: 「真理是这一切的最终原则，而真理必得不受束缚。若真理失去其翼，其铮音亦将沉寂。」 ～万物之歌，167节

trans-unit.source: Accumulated Knowledge
trans-unit.target: 累积的知识

trans-unit.source: Draw a card, then draw cards equal to the number of Accumulated Knowledge cards in all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: 抽一张牌，然后计算在所有坟墓场中累积的知识牌之数量，并抽等量的牌。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen and heard much here. There are secrets within secrets. Let me show you."\n—Takara, to Eladamri
trans-unit.target: 「我已经看得够多，也听得够多了，此处的秘密中还藏有秘密。这就让你看看。」 ～塔卡菈致艾拉达力

trans-unit.source: Aether Barrier
trans-unit.target: 乙太障壁

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a creature spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless he or she pays o1.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一玩家使用生物咒语时，除非该玩家支付1，否则他必须牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Creatures fade in and out of existence. It's an unfortunate side effect. The losses are tolerable."\n—Belbe
trans-unit.target: 「生物会逐渐显现和隐没其存在。这是一个不幸的副作用，但其损失还算可以忍受。」 ～贝尔蓓

trans-unit.source: Air Bladder
trans-unit.target: 气囊

trans-unit.resname: NEM·28 | Air Bladder | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·28 | Air Bladder | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: Random mutations among Rootwater merfolk were common—and disturbing.
trans-unit.target: 随机的突变在根潭人鱼身上不但常见～还常造成困扰。

trans-unit.source: Cloudskate
trans-unit.target: 滑云𫚉

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退3（此生物进场时，上面有三个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.source: Daze
trans-unit.target: 目眩

trans-unit.source: You may return an island you control to its owner's hand instead of paying Daze's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为将你操控的一张海岛移回其拥有者手上，以代替支付目眩的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays o1.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语的操控者多支付1，否则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.source: Dominate
trans-unit.target: 支配

trans-unit.source: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X or less. (This spell's effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 获得目标总魔法力费用不大于X之生物的操控权。（此咒语的效应不会在回合结束时结束。）

trans-unit.source: "I've come to reclaim what is mine. And you, Greven, are mine."\n—Volrath
trans-unit.target: 「我是来取回属于我的东西。而格利文，你就是我的。」 ～瓦拉司

trans-unit.source: Ensnare
trans-unit.target: 诱捕

trans-unit.source: You may return two islands you control to their owner's hand instead of paying Ensnare's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为将你操控的两张海岛移回其拥有者手上，以代替支付诱捕的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Tap all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 横置所有生物。

trans-unit.source: Rootwater has become as dangerous to its denizens as to its enemies.
trans-unit.target: 根潭变得对它的居民和敌人都一样危险。

trans-unit.source: Infiltrate
trans-unit.target: 渗透

trans-unit.source: Target creature is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物在本回合中不可被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Getting in was the easy part. Getting out proved to be more difficult.
trans-unit.target: 进去还算简单，出来可就难了。

trans-unit.source: Jolting Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 颠簸人鱼

trans-unit.resname: NEM·34 | Jolting Merfolk | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 4 (This creature comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退4（此生物进场时，上面有四个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.resname: NEM·34 | Jolting Merfolk | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove a fade counter from Jolting Merfolk: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: 从颠簸人鱼上移去一个消退指示物﹕横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Oraxid
trans-unit.target: 欧拉克蟹

trans-unit.source: Protection from red
trans-unit.target: 反红保护

trans-unit.source: "I'm constantly amazed by the tenacity of living creatures on this plane. Even in the stronghold's white-hot core, life persists."\n—Ertai
trans-unit.target: 「我总是惊讶于这个时空中的生物是多么顽强。就算在城塞的白热核心中也有生命能延续。」 ～尔泰

trans-unit.source: Pale Moon
trans-unit.target: 苍白之月

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, if a player taps a nonbasic land for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of its normal type.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，若玩家横置任一非基本地以产生魔法力，该地改为产生无色魔法力。

trans-unit.source: Denizens of Rath had never seen the moon before. It was a symbol of change, not constancy.
trans-unit.target: 瑞斯的居民从未见过月亮。它象征变动，而非恒久。

trans-unit.source: Parallax Tide
trans-unit.target: 时空震浪潮

trans-unit.resname: NEM·37 | Parallax Tide | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 5
trans-unit.target: 消退5

trans-unit.resname: NEM·37 | Parallax Tide | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Remove a fade counter from Parallax Tide: Remove target land from the game.
trans-unit.target: 从时空震浪潮上移去一个消退指示物﹕将目标地移出游戏。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·37 | Parallax Tide | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Parallax Tide leaves play, each player returns to play all cards he or she owns removed from the game with Parallax Tide.
trans-unit.target: 当时空震浪潮离场时，每位玩家将他们被时空震浪潮移出游戏的所有牌移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Rising Waters
trans-unit.target: 水位上涨

trans-unit.resname: NEM·38 | Rising Waters | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 所有地在其操控者的重置步骤中均不可重置。

trans-unit.resname: NEM·38 | Rising Waters | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 在每位玩家的维持开始时，该玩家重置一张他所操控的地。

trans-unit.source: Rising waters, sinking hope.
trans-unit.target: 水位越上涨，希望越下沈。

trans-unit.source: Rootwater Commando
trans-unit.target: 根潭突击兵

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an island.)
trans-unit.target: 海岛行者（若防御玩家操控任何海岛，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: Rootwater merfolk are seldom seen these days, but elf corpses are as numerous as ever.

trans-unit.source: Skyshroud Cutter

trans-unit.source: If you control a forest, you may have each other player gain 5 life instead of paying Skyshroud Cutter's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控树林，你可改为令每位其他玩家获得5点生命，以代替支付天帷镰腕兽的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Skyshroud Poacher
trans-unit.target: 天帷盗猎者

trans-unit.source: o3, oc T: Search your library for an Elf card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 3﹐T﹕从你的牌库中搜寻一张妖精牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "It's OK. They're just elves."
trans-unit.target: 「没关系，他们只是妖精。」

trans-unit.source: Skyshroud Ridgeback
trans-unit.target: 天帷隆背兽

trans-unit.source: Fading 2 (This creature comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退2（此生物进场时，上面有两个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.source: Skyshroud Sentinel
trans-unit.target: 天帷哨兵

trans-unit.source: When Skyshroud Sentinel comes into play, you may search your library for up to three Skyshroud Sentinel cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当天帷哨兵进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张天帷哨兵牌，展示它们，并将它们置入你手牌中。若你如此做，将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Stampede Driver
trans-unit.target: 兽奔驭者

trans-unit.source: o1o G, oc T, Discard a card from your hand: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 1G﹐T﹐从你手上弃掉一张牌﹕你操控的所有生物得+1/+1，并且获得践踏异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "The thunder of hooves is music to my ears."
trans-unit.target: 「脚蹄奔踏的巨响在我听来就像是音乐。」

trans-unit.source: Treetop Bracers
trans-unit.target: 树梢护臂

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can be blocked only by creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+1/+1，并且只能被具飞行异能的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Gravity is truly what you make of it.
trans-unit.target: 重力的意义，端看你如何解释它。

trans-unit.source: Wild Mammoth
trans-unit.target: 野生长毛象

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than any other, that player gains control of Wild Mammoth.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若某位玩家操控的生物最多，则该玩家获得野生长毛象的操控权。

trans-unit.source: "Sit. Heel! Down! HELP!"
trans-unit.target: 「坐下。跟我来！停下来！救命啊！」

trans-unit.source: Woodripper
trans-unit.target: 裂林兽

trans-unit.source: Fading 3 (This creature comes into play with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退3（此生物进场时，上面有三个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.source: o1, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 1﹐从裂林兽上移去一个消逝指示物﹕消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.source: Belbe's Armor
trans-unit.target: 贝尔蓓之铠

trans-unit.source: o X, oc T: Target creature gets -X/+X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: X，T：目标生物得-X/+X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It protects her from the ravages of Phyrexia and the savages of Rath.
trans-unit.target: 这铠甲保护她免于非瑞克西亚的坏灭，以及瑞斯的蛮野。

trans-unit.source: Belbe's Portal
trans-unit.target: 贝尔蓓的时光通道

trans-unit.source: As Belbe's Portal comes into play, choose a creature type. o3, oc T: Put a creature card of the chosen type from your hand into play.
trans-unit.target: 在贝尔蓓的时光通道进场时，选择一个生物种类。 3，T：从你的手牌中选择一张该生物种类的生物牌，并将其放置进场。

trans-unit.source: The fight will continue on a new battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 战火将延烧至新的战场上。

trans-unit.source: Complex Automaton
trans-unit.target: 繁杂的机械兽

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more permanents, return Complex Automaton to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控七个或更多的永久物，则将繁杂的机械兽移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: "This wasteful design cannot possibly be Phyrexian."\n—Belbe
trans-unit.target: 「这种过度设计的机械，不可能来自非瑞克西亚。」 ～贝尔蓓

trans-unit.resname: NEM·129 | Eye of Yawgmoth | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eye of Yawgmoth
trans-unit.target: 约格莫夫之眼

trans-unit.resname: NEM·129 | Eye of Yawgmoth | Card Text
trans-unit.source: o3, oc T, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Put one into your hand and remove the rest from the game.
trans-unit.target: 3，T，牺牲一个生物：从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量。将其中一张牌置入你手牌中，并将其他的牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: Flint Golem
trans-unit.target: 燧石魔像

trans-unit.source: Whenever Flint Golem becomes blocked, defending player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当燧石魔像被阻挡时，防御玩家将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Flowstone Armor
trans-unit.target: 液石铠甲

trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap Flowstone Armor during your untap step. o3, oc T: Target creature gets +1/-1 as long as Flowstone Armor remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: 在你的重置步骤中，你可以选择不重置液石铠甲。 3，T：只要液石铠甲持续被横置，目标生物便得+1/-1。

trans-unit.source: Flowstone Thopter
trans-unit.target: 液石振翼机

trans-unit.source: o1: Flowstone Thopter gets +1/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 1：液石振翼机得+1/-1并获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Airborne flowstone isn't less dangerous, only less common.
trans-unit.target: 飞天的液石并非较不危险，只是较不常见。

trans-unit.source: Kill Switch
trans-unit.target: 停机开关

trans-unit.source: o2, oc T: Tap all other artifacts. They don't untap during their controllers' untap steps as long as Kill Switch remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: 2，T：横置所有其他的神器。只要停机开关持续被横置，这些神器在其操控者的重置步骤中便不可重置。

trans-unit.source: Success is largely a matter of knowing which lever to pull.
trans-unit.target: 成功的主要因素是知道该拉下哪个拉杆。

trans-unit.source: Parallax Inhibitor
trans-unit.target: 时空震抑制器

trans-unit.source: o1, oc T, Sacrifice Parallax Inhibitor: Put a fade counter on each permanent with fading you control.
trans-unit.target: 1，T，牺牲时空震抑制器：在每个你所操控，且具有消退异能的永久物上放置一个消退指示物。

trans-unit.source: "The best I can offer is a temporary reprieve."\n—Belbe
trans-unit.target: 「我顶多也只能再缓上个一阵子。」 ～贝尔蓓

trans-unit.source: Predator, Flagship
trans-unit.target: 飞空旗舰掠夺者号

trans-unit.source: o2: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. o5, oc T: Destroy target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: 2：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 5，T：消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: "The scourge of Skyshroud is airborne once more."\n—Oracle *en*-Vec
trans-unit.target: 「天帷的苦难之源再度从天而降。」 ～维克族神谕使

trans-unit.source: Rackling
trans-unit.target: 拷架人

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Rackling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand fewer than three.
trans-unit.target: 在每一个对手的维持开始时，拷架人对该玩家造成X点伤害， X等同于三减去该玩家的手牌数量。

trans-unit.source: "This may hurt a little."
trans-unit.target: 「这可能痛少一些。」

trans-unit.source: Rejuvenation Chamber
trans-unit.target: 活力室

trans-unit.source: Fading 2 (This artifact comes into play with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) oc T: You gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 消退2＃（此神器进场时，上面有两个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之） T：你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Rusting Golem
trans-unit.target: 生锈魔像

trans-unit.resname: NEM·138 | Rusting Golem | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 5 (This creature comes into play with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退5（此生物进场时，上面有五个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.resname: NEM·138 | Rusting Golem | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Rusting Golem's power and toughness are each equal to the number of fade counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 生锈魔像的力量与防御力各等同于其上消退指示物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Tangle Wire
trans-unit.target: 纠结缆线

trans-unit.resname: NEM·139 | Tangle Wire | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fading 4 (This artifact comes into play with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
trans-unit.target: 消退4（此神器进场时，上面有四个消退指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个消退指示物。若你无法如此作，则牺牲之）

trans-unit.resname: NEM·139 | Tangle Wire | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.
trans-unit.target: 在每个玩家的维持开始时，纠结缆线上每有一个消退指示物，则该玩家横置一个他所操控的神器、生物或地。

trans-unit.source: Viseling
trans-unit.target: 虎钳人

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus four.
trans-unit.target: 在每一个对手的维持开始时，虎钳人对该玩家造成X点伤害，X等同于该玩家的手牌数量减四。

trans-unit.source: "This may hurt a lot."
trans-unit.target: 「这可能痛多一些。」

trans-unit.source: Kor Haven
trans-unit.target: 寇族庇护地

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. o1o W, oc T: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
trans-unit.target: T：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。 1W，T：在本回合中防止目标进行攻击的生物将要造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: Rath's Edge
trans-unit.target: 瑞斯危沿

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. o4, oc T, Sacrifice a land: Rath's Edge deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: T：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。 4，T，牺牲一张地：瑞斯危沿对目标生物或玩家造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Terrain Generator
trans-unit.target: 领地增生器

trans-unit.source: oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. o2, oc T: Put a basic land card from your hand into play tapped.
trans-unit.target: T：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。 2，T：从你的手牌中将一张基本地牌横置进场。
